source.title: Nobody Seems To Like The New Halloween Event In Borderlands 4 - Kotaku
source.name: Kotaku

facts: The new Halloween event in Borderlands 4 is free
Players are not liking the new Halloween event

neutral.headline: Free but Disliked: New Halloween Event Receives Mixed Reactions from Players of Borderlands 4 - Kotaku
neutral.body_html: The latest addition to the popular video game, Borderlands 4, is a free-to-play event themed around Halloween. Despite its cost being zero dollars for players who wish to participate in this new spooky experience, it seems that not everyone shares enthusiasm.

conservative.headline: Players Dislike New Free Halloween Event in Borderlands 4 - Kotaku
conservative.body_html: The new free-to-play event, themed around the horrors of Kairos for Halloween season in Borderlands 4, is not well received by players. Despite its cost being zero dollars to participate, it seems that this latest addition does little more than disappoint.

liberal.headline: Players Dislike New Free Halloween Event in Borderlands 4 - Kotaku
liberal.body_html: The new free-to-play event, themed around the horrors of Kairos for Halloween season in Borderlands 4, is not well received by players. Despite its cost being zero dollars to participate and aiming at providing a unique experience during this festive time, it seems that something about this latest addition does little more than disappoint.
